negative_thoughts.question: Is your stress caused by negative thoughts?
negative_thoughts.recommendation: read motivational articles,read some books or watch movies!

overworked.question: Are you mentally and physically overworked?
overworked.recommendation: try meditating, take your supplements, promote rest and mental relaxation

health_issues.question: Are you stressed because of a disease?
health_issues.recommendation: Seek medical help from a professional or ask for help from your family and friends
